ygData.subject: Re: [SG-Online-RPGers] Discount on games
ygData.msgSnippet: Thses distributors ought to be whipped. Bloody hell, that means ppl will go for more piracted s/w when the price goes up on retail. hmm... i predict a BIG
ygData.messageBody:
Thses distributors ought to be whipped. Bloody hell, that means ppl will go
for more piracted s/w when the price goes up on retail.

hmm... i predict a BIG comeback of the Ah Beng s/w store at our nearest
neigbourhood center soon.

The distributors are fueling a demand for cheaper Ah Beng s/w now. Guess
they "deserve it" for being greedy. I was about to buy the retail MW4 and
Anosian war. To hell with them. i go play D2 :P


Regards
Alex

*disclaimer : the above are personal opinions, They are no way indictive
of the company i work for, family i live with and the woman i sleep with.
Not forgetting the gamers I Frag with and the lamers i PK on.
